data.title: Embargoes: FAQ
data.excerpt: DCC may embargo cannabis products to prevent their sale, distribution, disposal, or removal from the location when the DCC has probable cause to believe the products are adulterated or mislabeled, or that their sale would otherwise be in violation of MAUCRSA or the DCC’s regulations.

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
